name: NOTIK
overview:
About Charity Tick Join our unique approach in changing this world, one penny at a time.

In this tough economy, charitable donations are one of the first things that many cut or eliminate altogether. Many organizations are suffering financially. CharityTick’s online auctions offer a convenient service to both parties.

Our online marketplace features the hottest electronics, gift cards, jewelry, hard-to-find tickets, and many other items. Like other online auction sites, anyone can bid but, all of our sellers are reputable non-profit-organizations, so proceeds go to charitable causes.

Not only are charities the home for your bids, but it’s entirely up to you to choose your preference of Charity AND personally select the prize you wish to place your bid on.

This auction type is exciting since individuals can win quality ticket items at up to 80% off their retail value. Being that each bid costs a nominal fee, the organization can collect more than double the retail value for each item.

Charitytick.com is rooting for everyone’s giving in whatever small doses they can afford, and our worthy charities end up earning much more.

It’s a win-win for everyone!

We provide:

Online auction platform: We provide an online auction platform for charities to list items that were donated to them in order to help raise money. Technical support & Customer service: At charitytick.com, a dedicated team keeps the platform running smoothly. Our skilled IT and administrative staff stand ready to tackle the occasional glitches that are unavoidable online, as well as simply walk a “newbie” through our system. Charity verification: CharityTick verifies the 501(c)(3) status and incorporation of each charity before confirming membership and allowing the organization to list items for auction. Fraud protection: CharityTick monitors for fraud by ensuring that there is no unusual bid activity (ex. getting above average bid.) Welcome to Charitytick.com, where giving is receiving!
